A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Don't listen to the petulant fanboys with their  self-righteous notion's of what Star Wars is supposed to be. While not perfect\, this film is still fantastic despite its few flaws. Poignant\, often funny\,  loaded with action and spectacle and most importantly heart. The naysayers are always the loudest voices in the room and you would be best to ignore them\, go in with an open mind\, and prepare to have a blast.
